page.title: 06DENHOLM TREK
page.content: The Denholm trek is a walk around and through the village and was prepared by the primary school.Post one is a view of the Teviot and it's flood plain and the old supports of the suspension bridge.The post two view is in the village and is a view of Leydens cottage and other buildings like the Text House and West gate Hall and the old Stocking Mill.Leydens cottage is thatched.Murrys house is where the knitwear shop now is.Murry wrote a dictionary and is famous.There is a monument to Dr John Leyden on the green.The church in the village was built in 1844.In the main street there are five houses joined together to help smugglers escape.So the story goes.
